name: Last Battleground:Winter Shoot
description:
Last Battleground: Winter Shooter!!!
Play fast paced world war with sniper and amazing first person shooters
Shoot & aim accurately to get the exact position of enemies. Use all your specialized skills to survive in order to avenge of your fallen soldiers. Perform all challenging missions technically to achieve the medal of the best first-person shooter.
Features:
1: Marvelous first-person shooter gameplay
2: Mind blowing & challenging environment
3: Realistic 3D graphics
4: Stunning 3D audio & visual effects
5: Variety of modern weapons & equipment
